channel.title: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge
channel.description: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge

item.title: add 'bashtop'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: bashtop - Linux resource monitor written in pure Bash.

item.title: add 'OWASP WSTG'; update resources
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: OWASP WSTG - is a comprehensive open source guide to testing the security of web apps.

item.title: add 'ISC's Knowledgebase'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: ISC's Knowledgebase - you'll find some general information about BIND 9, ISC DHCP, and Kea DHCP.

item.title: add 'isbgpsafeyet.com'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Is BGP safe yet? - check BGP (RPKI) security of ISPs and other major Internet players.

item.title: #155 - add 'inception'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: inception - a highly configurable tool to check for whatever you like against any number of hosts.

item.title: Merge pull request #167 from tuximail/master
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: Mosh - is a SSH wrapper designed to keep a SSH session alive over a volatile connection.

  :small_orange_diamond: Eternal Terminal - is similar to Mosh, but enables mouse-scrolling and tmux commands inside the SSH session.

  :small_orange_diamond: Eternal Terminal - enables mouse-scrolling and tmux commands inside the SSH session.

item.title: update description
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Eternal Terminal - enables mouse-scrolling and tmux commands inside the SSH session.

item.title: Added 'mosh' and 'et' as SSH alternatives for sessions over a poor inâ€¦
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: Mosh - is a SSH wrapper designed to keep a SSH session alive over a volatile connection.

  :small_orange_diamond: Eternal Terminal - is similar to Mosh, but enables mouse-scrolling and tmux commands inside the SSH session.

item.title: add 'Cryptohack'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Cryptohack - a fun platform for learning modern cryptography.

item.title: add 'sherlock'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: sherlock - hunt down social media accounts by username across social networks.

item.title: add 'pgsync' and 'iredis'
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: pgsync - sync data from one Postgres database to another.

  :small_orange_diamond: iredis - a terminal client for redis with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.

item.title: add 'Linux Troubleshooting 101 , 2016 Edition'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Linux Troubleshooting 101 , 2016 Edition - everything is a DNS Problem...

item.title: update openssl one-liners v3
item.description:
postalAddress = "Keller" # L/postaladdress=
Example of `oids` (you'll probably also have to make OpenSSL know about the new fields required for EV by adding the following under `[new_oids]`):
```
[req]
...
oid_section = new_oids
[ new_oids ]
postalCode = 2.5.4.17
streetAddress = 2.5.4.9
```
For more information please look at these great explanations:
- [RFC 5280](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280)
- [How to create multidomain certificates using config files](https://apfelboymchen.net/gnu/notes/openssl%20multidomain%20with%20config%20files.html)
- [Generate a multi domains certificate using config files](https://gist.github.com/romainnorberg/464758a6620228b977212a3cf20c3e08)
- [Your OpenSSL CSR command is out of date](https://expeditedsecurity.com/blog/openssl-csr-command/)
- [OpenSSL example configuration file](https://www.tbs-certificats.com/openssl-dem-server-cert.cnf)

item.title: update openssl one-liners v2
item.description: > Look at these great explanations: [How to create multidomain certificates using config files](https://apfelboymchen.net/gnu/notes/openssl%20multidomain%20with%20config%20files.html) and [Generate a multi domains certificate using config files](https://gist.github.com/romainnorberg/464758a6620228b977212a3cf20c3e08).

item.title: add 'Linux Kernel Teaching'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Linux Kernel Teaching - is a collection of lectures and labs Linux kernel topics.

item.title: add 'dnsgrep' and 'rapid7 datasets'
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: DNSGrep - quickly searching large DNS datasets.

  :small_orange_diamond: Rapid7 Labs Open Data - is a great resources of datasets from Project Sonar.

item.title: add 'OWASP Threat Dragon'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: OWASP Threat Dragon - is a tool used to create threat model diagrams and to record possible threats.
